group_1.textLeft: We're gonna meet up at this station?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I got a message from the instructor@saying she'd be coming here later...

group_1.textLeft: Okie dokie★
Well then, see ya Sasha!

group_1.textRight: Yes, now please excuse me!♪

group_1.textLeft: Huh? I thought we'd be working in Takarazaki@together.

group_1.textRight: Actually, Hime and I discussed it, and we@decided I'd go back to my hometown.

group_1.textLeft: Does that mean you have something to do there?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I plan to bring back some friends.
Wouldn't it be much better if we had@strength in numbers?
*Giggle*♪

group_1.textLeft: We don't have any Feathers right now, so that@would be a big help...

group_1.textRight: Yes, so please wait with anticipation.
Let's both do our best!♪

group_1.textLeft: Good luck, Sasha!

group_1.textRight: Yes, best of luck to you as well, Hime!
I didn't think we were going to split up here...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm surprised too...

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.5][chara:102901:lipSynch_1]Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Ohhh, sorry, just talking to my bae in my head.

group_1.textRight: I've been wondering... What is that "bae,"@exactly…?
I was wondering, too...
About your...boyfriend? Does he really exist...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I'm talking to him, aren't I? Of course@he does.

group_1.textRight: But, I don't see anyone...
Could you be talking to him using some kind of@telepathy...?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, that's wrong, it's really like I said.@He's in this cutie's head.
It's like having, what's it called...@Split personalities? Something like that.
There's another person in my head I talk to,@who has their own separate memories.
Got it?

group_1.textRight: .........[wait:0.8][chara:103001:lipSynch_1]Sort of?
...Well, whatever the case is, what did this@"boyfriend" of yours say?

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Well, he was wondering what sort of@"instructions" this girl has for us.

group_1.textRight: ...You mean, like if there's some type of@ulterior motive?

group_1.textLeft: Yup, like, now she’s willing to hear out@the group she’d already rejected.
So maybe she's thinking about how she can use us?

group_1.textRight: The instructor is strong, but maybe not in a@cunning way...
Eep!!

group_1.textLeft: Hagumun!
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]That was totally on purpose! She just rammed@right into you!
Seriously, totally unbelievable!

group_1.textRight: That shocked me...

group_1.textLeft: ...Um, Hagumun, where's your bag…?

group_1.textRight: Eh…?
It's gone...

group_1.textLeft: It was a hit-and-run theft...!
Forget the meet-up, we have to go after her!
It pisses me off when someone hurts my friends...

group_1.textRight: I-it seems like you're a lot more upset about this@than I am...

group_1.textLeft: Of course I'm upset! Like I said before, we're@companions, right?!
When my friends who are fighting alongside me@and helping me get to the top are wronged...
It would be weird NOT to get pissed off about it,@right?!

group_1.textRight: Th-thank you...
Um, hey…!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: Uh, um, you can keep the bag, but please@give me back my student ID and wallet!

group_1.textLeft: Hagumun... I don't think she cares about@the bag in particular...

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see!
Anyway, snatching people's bags is wrong!
This cutie's gonna turn you over to the police@now, got that?

group_1.textLeft: Hmph…!

group_1.textRight: You…!!

group_1.textCenter: You're gonna be sorry you ran into us!@Now, repent for your wrongdoing!

group_1.textRight: Eh?

group_1.textLeft: Hallo!

group_1.textRight: Hallo!

group_1.textLeft: Hey y'all, we're here to save the day, so there's@no need to worry, okay?

group_1.textRight: That's right, we're the Magical Girl team who@protects this town from all wrongdoings!
[textRed:Mitsune Miwa], and...

group_1.textLeft: [textRed:Jun Kazari], and together we'll solve all problems!
